page.title: 19RELIGION IN BROMPTON
page.content: There is a small Church of England & Methodist community in Brompton.Other denominations worship in Northallerton.St.Thomas(Parish Church) is in the diocese of York under the authority of the Bishop of Whitby.The average church attendance is 30_50 for the three regular Sunday Services but down to 3_4 for the weekly ones.The baptisms and funerals average 20 a year with 15 confirmations & a dozen weddings.The churchyard is closed but a council cemetery is available although cremations at Darlington are more popular.The Methodist Church is part of the Northallerton Circuit with a membership of 128.It has an average congregation of 20_30 meeting twice on Sundays.Monthly it shares Evensong with St.Thomas and alternates services at an elderly peoples'home. Both churches have social activities.
